subtitleNullable: Dataset containing Hindi text to be used for fake news detection
descriptionNullable:
This is the dataset created as an effort towards fake news detection in Hindi and is to the best of our knowledge the largest. It is a labelled dataset with 1 representing Fake News and 0 representing True News. For detailed information about the dataset creation and the experiments undertaken refer the paper 
Title: "Hindi Fake News Detection using Deep Embedded Models". 
Authors: Sinchana Kumbale, Arnav Agrawal, Andrew J
Affiliation: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Manipal Institute of Technology, Manipal Academy of Higher Education, Manipal
title: Hindi Fake News Detection Dataset (HFDND)
